item.description:
Hi.

It's Meet up time again.

Matt and Lisa Swanks house.

Please bring snack Items and drinks. There will be a snack table for the Pugs also.

If it is very warm we will have pool open and a kiddie pool for the Pugs... especially miss MOLLY... She just loved it last year...

Notice: We will also be having the fund raiser Manchester chapter Pug rescue Yard Sale at our house on the following Saturday. May 26th from 8:00AM till ??? So when you come to the meet bring your items that you will be donating for the sale...

Also. There will be a suprise guest "PUG" at the meet...

If you have questions or need directions. e-mail me at msrockydo@hotmail.com

Mapblast or mapquest or expedia will get you here also...

This is going to be a huge sucess because were all going to want to meet our suprise guest!!!

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: PUG MEETUP
